issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
An error is logged during network meta-data access when a security group is not found:

fields.summary: Error / stacktrace logged for missing network group (meta-data)

comments.body: possible logging issue, may have functional impact.
The error was logged during the euca-sequence-4.1 QA test sequence.
Have not seen this error in the logs.
